message: Let's start with a fair split, then negotiate from there!
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I'm not going easy on you yet!
I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need a better deal to make it worth my while!
I'm not getting desperate yet, but I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal. Take it or leave it!
I'm getting closer to my target, but I'm still willing to negotiate. Don't make me walk away!
I'm getting a little desperate, but I'm still holding out for a better deal. Make a serious offer or I'll take what I can get!
This is my final offer. I'm willing to make a significant concession, but I need a deal now!
I'm running out of options, but I'm not giving in yet. Take it or leave it, but I'm not going any lower!
This is my last offer. I'm willing to give you a tiny share, but I need a deal now. No more negotiations!
I'm not getting any younger, and I'm not getting any more generous. Take it or leave it, but I'm not going down without a fight!
